item.title: Mixture of Gas and Vapor
item.description: Gas gaseous form at room conditions we refer to gases as the “dry” part of the mixture vapor gaseous form of a liquid at room conditions refer vapor as the moisture content of the mixture Measure of moisture content moisture content measures the composition of the mixture absolute humidity (or humidity ratio or specific humidity) $$w = \frac{m_v}{m_d}$$ Using Dalton’s model and the ideal gas equation, we can derive:
